name: Rainbow Cow
description:
Rainbow Cow is a game made by Louie and Ardydo back at 2017 for a gamejam called 'JogaTONA'. The jam was a celebration for Anita's carreer at Sesc Campinas and her promotion to Sesc 24 de Maio (São Paulo). 

The themes we got were "What is happening?", "Milk" and "My colors are different" which got us promptly thinking about minigame collection where you would collect colorful milk to make a rainbow milkshake, the most obvious choice.

Win all the minigames to colect the shakes 'till you have a Rainbow Milkshake for our cow!
